The rent for Nancy Pelosi: s district office is $18,736 a month, as reported in a Roll Call analysis of a database assembled by the Sunlight Foundation.
Pelosi: s monthly rent for her district office is nearly double the next-highest rental paid by a member of the House.
The rental data was released by Pelosi h: s quarterly Statement of Disbursements, which was made available online for the first time in November 2009.
